info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 6:46AM CDT until April 7 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee...
Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County.
For the Duck River...including Centerville...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Duck River at Centerville.
* WHEN...From this evening to just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood waters will cover the flood plain along the river. Several roads near the river will be partially covered. In Centerville, Hickman Springs Road and Defeated Creek Road will be affected. Leatherwood Road between Shady Grove and Primm Springs near Tottys Bend will also be affected.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river will fall to 17.9 feet this morning. It will then rise to flood stage this evening. It will fall to 15.8 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then rise to 16.4 feet Tuesday evening. It will fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
